venue.name: The Healing Center at Our Weeping Angel Foundation

item.description:
Save the date!

Jan 4 marks the 9th Annual World Hypnotism Day celebration.

Hypnotists around the world are offering free community services and seminars.

 

Learn Self-Hypnosis for Personal Development - seminar

Join Certified Hypnotist Kathryn McGlynn and discover how you can create lasting changes in your behavior patterns by understanding how easy it is to "Change your mind and keep the change".

 

Preregistration required as space is limited.

 

Admission by donation. Suggested donation : $10.00

100% of all proceeds donated to Our Weeping Angel Foundation, a non-profit foundation that helps people gain access to holistic healthcare.


For more info : http://www.hypnosis.ws

 

 

 

.

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: World Hypnotism Day celebration - hypnosis seminar
